subsection_content:
The effectiveness of treatments for dissociative disorders has not been studied. Treatment options are based on case studies. Options may include:
A safe environment; Psychiatric medications, such as sedatives; Psychotherapy (also called ‘talk therapy’ or counselling) is often needed over the long term; Stress management; Treatment of other accompanying disorders
